docs.snippet: The Trump administration said in court documents on Thursday it wants a pause in the legal fight over its ban on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations, so it can issue a replacement ban as it strives to protect the nation from terroris...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Trump administration said in court documents on Thursday it wants a pause in the legal fight over its ban on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations, so it can issue a replacement ban as it strives to protect the nation from terrorism.

headline.main: Trump Seeks Pause in Legal Fight With Revised Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Trump Seeks Pause in Legal Fight With Revised Travel Ban

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's travel ban did not appear to affect a Syrian man's attempts to bring his wife and young daughter to Wisconsin, U.S. Justice Department attorneys told a federal judge Friday, noting that the family's asylum applications wer...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's travel ban did not appear to affect a Syrian man's attempts to bring his wife and young daughter to Wisconsin, U.S. Justice Department attorneys told a federal judge Friday, noting that the family's asylum applications were still being processed.

headline.main: DOJ: Travel Ban Didn't Impact Wisconsin Asylum Seeker
headline.print_headline: DOJ: Travel Ban Didn't Impact Wisconsin Asylum Seeker

docs.snippet: The Latest on the court battle over President Donald Trump's travel ban (all times local):...

headline.main: The Latest: Court to Hold Off on Travel Ban Decision
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Court to Hold Off on Travel Ban Decision

docs.snippet: The continuing controversy over former national security adviser Michael Flynn's communications with Russia was just the latest in a series of imbroglios that have roiled the Trump administration since it took office on Jan. 20....
docs.lead_paragraph: The continuing controversy over former national security adviser Michael Flynn's communications with Russia was just the latest in a series of imbroglios that have roiled the Trump administration since it took office on Jan. 20.

headline.main: Factbox: Trump Controversies: Michael Flynn, the Travel Ban and Others
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Trump Controversies: Michael Flynn, the Travel Ban and Others

docs.snippet: Syria's President Bashar al-Assad said President Donald Trump's ban on Syrians entering the United States targeted terrorists, not the Syrian people, appearing to defend the logic of the measure in an interview broadcast on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Syria's President Bashar al-Assad said President Donald Trump's ban on Syrians entering the United States targeted terrorists, not the Syrian people, appearing to defend the logic of the measure in an interview broadcast on Thursday.

headline.main: Assad Says Trump Travel Ban Targets Terrorists, Not Syria's People
headline.print_headline: Assad Says Trump Travel Ban Targets Terrorists, Not Syria's People

docs.snippet: The state of Texas on Wednesday defended President Donald Trump's ban on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations as an assertion of presidential authority intended to protect the country from terrorists, splitting with states that have d...
docs.lead_paragraph: The state of Texas on Wednesday defended President Donald Trump's ban on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations as an assertion of presidential authority intended to protect the country from terrorists, splitting with states that have denounced the order as a religious attack.

headline.main: Texas Splits With Other States to Defend Trump's Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Texas Splits With Other States to Defend Trump's Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Somalia's breakaway northern territory of Somaliland is asking the United States for an exemption to President Donald Trump's executive order on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Somalia's breakaway northern territory of Somaliland is asking the United States for an exemption to President Donald Trump's executive order on travelers from seven predominantly Muslim nations.

headline.main: Somaliland Asks US for Exemption to Trump's Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Somaliland Asks US for Exemption to Trump's Travel Ban

docs.snippet: A Houston surgeon has canceled a trip to Iran to perform lifesaving surgeries because of uncertainty over the future of President Donald Trump's refugee and immigration travel ban....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Houston surgeon has canceled a trip to Iran to perform lifesaving surgeries because of uncertainty over the future of President Donald Trump's refugee and immigration travel ban.

headline.main: Trump Travel Ban Kills Surgeon's Lifesaving Trip to Iran
headline.print_headline: Trump Travel Ban Kills Surgeon's Lifesaving Trip to Iran

docs.snippet: A U.S. federal appeals court on Friday asked the Justice Department and the state of Washington to submit briefs on whether a larger panel of judges should decide if President Donald Trump's travel ban should remain on hold....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. federal appeals court on Friday asked the Justice Department and the state of Washington to submit briefs on whether a larger panel of judges should decide if President Donald Trump's travel ban should remain on hold.

headline.main: Appeals Court to Weigh Rehearing of Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court to Weigh Rehearing of Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: A federal judge Monday granted a preliminary injunction barring the Trump administration from implementing its travel ban in Virginia, adding another judicial ruling to those already in place challenging the ban's constitutionality....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge Monday granted a preliminary injunction barring the Trump administration from implementing its travel ban in Virginia, adding another judicial ruling to those already in place challenging the ban's constitutionality.

headline.main: Judge Grants Injunction Against Trump Travel Ban in Virginia
headline.print_headline: Judge Grants Injunction Against Trump Travel Ban in Virginia
